      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationCriteria orderByDescription()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application description.
      ApplicationCriteria orderByName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application name.
      ApplicationCriteria orderByStatus()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by application status.
      ApplicationCriteria withAccounts()
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated).
      ApplicationCriteria withAccounts(int limit)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated), limiting the first page of account results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withAccounts(int limit, int offset)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated) , with the first page of account results starting at the specified offset index and limiting the number of results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withAccountStoreMappings()
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated).
      ApplicationCriteria withAccountStoreMappings(int limit)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated), limiting the first page of AccountStoreMapping results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withAccountStoreMappings(int limit, int offset)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated) , with the first page of AccountStoreMapping results starting at the specified offset index and limiting the number of results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withGroups()
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated groups are also retrieved in the same request (paginated).
      ApplicationCriteria withGroups(int limit)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated groups are also retrieved in the same request (paginated), limiting the first page of group results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withGroups(int limit, int offset)
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated groups are also retrieved in the same request (paginated) , with the first page of Group results starting at the specified offset index and limiting the number of results to limit items.
      ApplicationCriteria withTenant()
      Ensures that when retrieving the resource, the owning Tenant is also retrieved in the same request.

      • withAccounts

        public ApplicationCriteria withAccounts()
        Description copied from interface: AccountStoreOptions
        Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated). This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.

        If you wish to control pagination parameters (offset and limit) for the returned groups, see the withAccounts(limit) or withAccounts(limit,offset) methods.

        Specified by:
        withAccounts in interface AccountStoreOptions<ApplicationCriteria>
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • withAccounts

        public ApplicationCriteria withAccounts(int limit)
        Description copied from interface: AccountStoreOptions
        Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated), limiting the first page of account results to limit items. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Specified by:
        withAccounts in interface AccountStoreOptions<ApplicationCriteria>
        Parameters:
        limit - the number of results in the Account collection's first page. Min: 1, Max: 100.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • withAccounts

        public ApplicationCriteria withAccounts(int limit,
                               int offset)
        Description copied from interface: AccountStoreOptions
        Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accounts are also retrieved in the same request (paginated) , with the first page of account results starting at the specified offset index and limiting the number of results to limit items. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Specified by:
        withAccounts in interface AccountStoreOptions<ApplicationCriteria>
        Parameters:
        limit - the number of results in the Account collection's first page. Min: 1, Max: 100.
        offset - the starting index of the first Account to retrieve in the overall Account collection's result set.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
